title: Format Output with Variables
description: Write a function called `format_greeting(name, age)` that returns a formatted string: 'Hello, [name]! You are [age] years old.'

test_cases.expected: Hello, Alice! You are 25 years old.
Hello, Bob! You are 30 years old.
Hello, Charlie! You are 18 years old.
Hello, Diana! You are 45 years old.
